content: the sweater is worked top down with raglan increases on the yoke short row are worked at the back of the neck with bobby pin technique the neckline is finished with a delicate margin giving a unique look for the sweater optional after raglan increases the yoke is divided for body and sleeves and the whole sweater is worked in the round with magic loop technique for detailed instructions see video at hunglish knitter youtube channel sizes s m l xl xxl chest circumference the sizes s m l xl xxl are designed to fit an approximate bust circumference of 90-95 95-100 105-110 110-115 115-120 cm 35 4-37 4 37 4-39 3 41 3-43 3 43 3-45 2 45 2 -47 2 inches gauge 23 sts x 30 row in stockinet stitch on 4 mm us8 needles = 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 inches needles circular needles 4 mm us6 and 3 mm us2 5 materials 8 stitch markers for the raglan 2 bobby pins or 2 stitch markers for the bobby pin technique yarn suggested yarn weight 3light shown here in patons beehive baby delicate green 70% acrylic 30% polyester 3 5 oz / 100 g = 389 yd /328 m estimated skeins needed depending on the length 2 3 4 5 6 times of 3 5 oz / 100 g = 389 yd /328 m 3light weight yar if this yarn is not available in your country try to find a 3light weight yarn with similar gauge
